DOC.brief_summary: To determine the safety and efficacy of 3 x 800 mg/day IBU-PC assessed by endoscopy and incidence of adverse events
DOC.brief_title: Ibuprofen-PC Compared With Ibuprofen in a GI Safety Trial
DOC.criteria: moderate osteoarthritis in the hip and/or knee requiring chronic pain medication others per protocol sensitivity to NSAIDs and lecithin hypertension history of GI and other specific problems use of medications and other criteria per the protocol
